def get_free_urinals(urinals):
    return -1 if '11' in urinals else sum(((len(l)-1)//2 for l in f'0{urinals}0'.split('1')))

def get_free_urinals(urinals):
    return -1 if "11" in urinals else sum(len(x)-1>>1 for x in f"0{urinals}0".split('1'))

def get_free_urinals(urinals):
    count = 0
    urinals = list(urinals)
            
    for i in range(len(urinals)):
        if (urinals[i] == '1'
            and i + 1 != len(urinals) 
            and urinals[i+1] == '1' ):
            return -1
        if (urinals[i] == '0'
           and ( i == 0 or urinals[i-1] == '0' ) 
           and ( i + 1 == len(urinals) or urinals[i+1] == '0' )
        ):
            urinals[i] = '2'
    return urinals.count('2')
